content.detailedDescription: Orange orbs were appearing over the horizon from the south, to my front, and the east, to my left. the orbs were coming up one after another, after another. in a uniform fashion, one by one. they would appear, sometimes go dim, sometimes get brighter, and they all would eventually disappear. but for some strange reason i never got to witness the disappearing. a new orb would appear to my left, and when i looked back to the front 1 or 2 would be gone, but then another would pop up over the horizon. it was unreal. well in the middle of all this the infamous black triangle showed up. it was completely silent. you hear people say completely silent, but you just don't realize how eerie it is to see a craft like that not making a sound until you see it yourself. it just seemed so smooth, best way to put it. it either passed by twice, or else 2 made a single pass by. shortly after the triangle(s) showed up the orbs stopped appearing. the whole experience was really overwhelming. i've never seen so much activity in the sky, there were orange balls everywhere, and they just kept coming and going. now i wish that i would of recorded the whole event, but after i got a lot on tape i just wanted to take it all in. i was missing out on the show trying to zoom in, adjust focus, and keep it all in frame. of course, when i turned the camera off, the activity really increased. i may have gotten the best footage ever of the legendary black triangle, had my camera been rolling. it passed right in front of me. at this point there were like 3 orbs straight ahead, 3 to the left, then the black triangle rolls through. i scrambled for the camera again, and thankfully i did manage to get the triangle on tape. the video really doesn't do much for how exciting this whole experience really was. i wish you could of seen it with your own eyes. i've seen many weird looking distant lights, strobing and everything. but this was like a smack in the face, here we are! kind of thing.
content.summary: Lots of orange orbs coming up from horizon, followed by a black triangle, all completely silent

content.detailedDescription:
sometime during the late summer of 1978, my now ex-wife and i were visiting the southern wisconsin tourist town of lake geneva. 
we were walking in a southeasterly direction in the 800 block of wrigley dr. near the northern end of the lake. it was just as the last rays of the sunset were lighting up a few clouds to the west. it was at that time that we noticed a saucer shaped craft above us, it was approximately 80 deg. from the horizon. there were 3 other people besides us also in the immediate vicinity, (within earshot that is). 
i remember making the comment that "we are now experiencing a ufo people." the 50 yd diameter craft was remarkably close, only about 150 yards away. we saw many details on the craft, not all of which we can remember. it moved silently and very slowly for 100 yards or so from west to east. it then changed direction to go away from us in a southerly direction at an ever increasing speed. we watched the craft until it was out of sight. my wife and i then proceeded to our car which was parked across the street and we left the area going on hwy. 12 south. when we had reached an area that was approximately near where county hwy. u crosses hwy. 12, it was already nightfall. it was at that time that we saw what we have assumed is the same craft, however it was brilliantly lit up with a wide lateral band around the craft. we noticed that it was a very complicated pattern of everchanging multi-colored lights. now this was 1978, it has only been recently that i have compared the lights to what today we would call a very complicated screensaver or even fractal color display. i pulled the car over to get a better look, but my wife looked very terrified, so i pulled back onto the road.
i know what i saw. i have worked for many years in the aerospace business as a r&d machinist. i know it was not of this planet.
content.summary: Up close saucer over lake geneva, wi. in 1978.

content.detailedDescription: Something told me to look out the window. i did for about 20 min. with my cam  zooming in and out the the sky when "bam" this orb/ufo appears out of thin air. it head east and it returned. it was flying back and forth from the spot you originally saw it pop up at. it did this for about an hour, turning into different shapes. it was flying over central park in nyc and from the park into atleast columbus ave. i ran to the park and caught more footage of it zooming back and forth, then it slowly dropped into the park. i have it on film also.. i have over an hour of footage. it was amazing...  it was bright red like a red diamond..  check the video.. i posted more up on youtube under "vik456" at youtube..   thanks and enjoy the footage.. again i have about 20 clips of the same craft over central park..  its amazing..
content.shape: Fireball,   Flash,   Oval,   Sphere,   Triangle,   Other
content.summary: Ufo/orb over central park nyc. 110209

content.detailedDescription: My wife had a severe cold and i was awaken around 5 am. i made a pot of coffee and as soon as it was finished, i got a cup and walked outside in the back yard. it was a crystal clear night and i saw a falling star. it was a pretty one as it split into about 4 sections as it burned out.I decided to keep looking up to see if i might catch another one. a minute or two passed and i saw something moving out of the north sky. it was a bright star like object but it looked much larger than the surrounding stars. it was traveling southward at a speed slower than a falling star but much faster than any aircraft i've ever witnessed. it was moving in a southeast direction and i was out of sight within ten seconds. about a minute or so later another one came by just like the first and it flew in the same direction at what seemed to be the same speed, i've never seen anything like this,
content.summary: 2 brilliant white lights, about 4 times the size as the largest star in the night sky

content.detailedDescription:
It was approximately summer in reno when i was a teenager. weather was clear and warm because i was outside. we lived on the ne corner of lander and st. lawrence streets. i was doing something in the yard, maybe just finishing washing the car or a similar activity. some movement overhead caught my eye. when i looked up i saw what i believed at the time was a black or dark hang- glider directly overhead. it had a redish circular spot at each corner on the underside. the red spots were not overly bright, but visible. if it was a hang-glider, it would have been about 200 to 300 feet directly above me as i was looking up between two trees that were separated by about 20 feet.
it was completely silent and turned 180 degrees in a quick, flat, fashion. after the turn, my view was blocked by the trees. i quickly rushed out to the street to see its continued path, but it was gone. 

at the time, i wondered what idiot would be flying a dark hang-glider directly above the city and at such a low altitude, and where would they land. because of the shape and the quietness, my mind just assumed it was a hang-glider. the incident seemed odd and out of place at the time, so i have always remembered it very clearly. however i didn't give it a whole lot of additional thought until recently when i saw a program about triangular ufos in nevada, then it clicked. it was not a hang-glider and could have been at any elevation if it were larger or smaller. probably larger.

i don't know the date for sure, but i lived at that house from 1973 to 1978, i was between 13 and 18, and i know it was in a warmer time of year, perhaps may to september, and the weather was dry and i believe cloudless. my recollection is that i was old enough to drive at the time. i thought i should report this and to see if anyone else saw similar things around the same time.
content.summary: Dark triangular object directly overhead, turning

content.detailedDescription: I was driving from webster, nc on webster rd, and i saw an orange ball larger and brighter than a star. it was going straight at a fast speed, about the speed of a shooting star if not slightly slower, towards (i think) the north. i was beside ingles almost at the stoplight when i stopped my automobile and stuck my head out of the window. it was still moving and it looked to slow down for a moment before it went out of sight behind a hill (i'm in the mountains). i have no idea if the change in speed was because of the altitude and angle. it went in the direction of the sonic drive in and the ford dealership. i looked at my phone and the time was 2133 hours. i was excited to see whatever it was. i thought it might be the space station. i got back to my home around five minutes to ten and checked to see where the space station was. at the time it was over the pacific ocean. i use to work on aircraft and what i saw was not a regular aircraft, if indeed it was an aircraft. i am in no position to say it wasn't natural.
content.summary: Orange light crossed the sky over ingles in sylva

content.detailedDescription:
Going through my photos from trip to san francisco.  sensor on my canon 20d is very dirty and i am cleaning up my photos a lot these days.  spots appear the most on sky shots, and on this particular shot i saw one spot that seemed to have a density and shape i never seen before or since on other shots from that trip.  i have submitted three versions of same photo, one with no photo shopping, one where i cleaned up all spots but one in question and a third with high contrast, removed the color and reduced the noise around the "ufo".  never heard anything or saw anything when i took the photo.  it is taken on top of fort point under the golden gate bridge looking west towards the pacific ocean.  an interesting sidenote this was taken the afternoon around the time of the fleet week air show which included the blue angel. maybe "they" were in the solar system and wanted to check out the show!? 

first time i picked up something like this, who knows, but it has that classic saucer shape.
content.summary: Interesting shape in photo

content.detailedDescription:
I was asleep. i awakened to feel the needed to go outside. across the street over the house in the distance i saw a combination of lights. half asleep i went inside to get my camera and car keys. i came back out and drove toward the lights. they seemed to be traveling away from me and i drove to where i took some photos before the lights were non visible. i came home and went back to bed. the next morning i thought, did i really do that? did i drive my car half asleep toward some lights in the sky and take photos? i got my camera off the kitchen table and looked, and i had taken photos. i downloaded them on my computer and the first one was just darkness. the second was darkness also, but after serching the photo in a magnified field i found a spot. on the lower right side i saw this object.
i really think it is was i saw outside when i 1st went out, before i had gotten the camera and followed it in my car.
  the 1st photo is darkness, 2nd has the object lower right side.
 seems to be blue sliver w/ white lite in the middle, around the outside of the object was red orange. can someone with a better computer program look at this photo and email me w/ a close up?
   also there were 2 corp formations in monroe co tn exactly 1yr apart, 2007-2008.
scott
content.summary: Something awakened me to go outside.

content.detailedDescription:
I was out, practicing long exposure pictures of the stars, in particular the big dipper, which was directly over head this night. i started looking for other stars to take pictures of, just exercising some night, long exposure practice shots. i noticed what didn't look normal to me off to the west. i thought to take long exposure pictures of it. noticing the stars overhead were moving ever so slowly, i noticed this object was moving particularly faster. i snapped a few shots, took a few video shots, but those didn't turn out. the pictures that i did get, i layered with photoshop, adjusted the layers so that the trees were aligned and the telephone pole and wires. i got this picture that i labeled ufo.Jpg as the result. clear movement. i also had prior to this, two planes, in their normal patterns it seemed, fly over head. i have pictures of those to compare to. working in the aviation field as i do, faa a&p licensed and work at an airport now, knowing the navigation light requirements, i can compare the pictures of the planes i know were planes, and see the strobe patterns, the streak of the red/green lights. this object i have here, is just glowing. i took precedence to report this as well, though late, as i was reviewing other reports. i noticed that a firefighter on duty reported seeing a glowing object on fire west of gardner as well. this may be similar, so it might help build a bigger picture in the end. 

if anyone wants to know camera details, please get in touch with me. basically, camera was on sturdy all metal tripod, as i was already setup taking pictures of the constellations. camera is canon sx110is (image stabilizer). 6 second exposures for each image.
content.summary: Glowing object west of gardner

content.detailedDescription: I was in the back yard and saw this airplane up in the nights sky i started thinking come towards me all sudden this huge airplane made a turn and started coming towards me and shined a big light on me half the backyard was glowing from this then the airplane made a sharp turn and  then it was out of my sight the light was very bright and was shining for about 8-10 secs i thought this airplane was going to crash on me i had never experienced such fright in my entire life!
content.summary: Huge light shined on me half the backyard was glowing with light

content.detailedDescription:
Yesterday there was a large white craft that was hovering in my yard around 9pn.It was atleast a couple feet long.It at first came in the form of a star.As it has been for several months.Since around august i have been seeing these star like ufo's.Everyday i go outside they blink there lights only for me.And when i tell everyone else the lights stop.

just 10 minutes ago i went outside and said "blink your lights" and sure enough the light was blinking and then started coming closer and closer to the house.So back to the story.

so i was looking out the front window thinking it was my mom and sister returning home and that's when i noticed the blinking "star".This time i actually saw colors coming from the blinking hovering star i had never seen.There was red.I just continued to look at the "star" for a few minutes and then i went to the bathroom.When i went back to the window the bathroom was right over my sisters window which is the front of the house.

i decided to take a closer look and go outside.So i put a coat on and headed out the door to take a look.When i looked i first saw the blinking light and then that's when i saw the whole body right there about 12-15 feet in the air floating above the front yard.It was cigar shaped and it sorta glowed either white or like a silvery,white,maetallic color.Towards the front the light was red and blinking.As soon as i saw that i immediatley ran in the house and locked the door.I called my mom and stayed on the phone with her till she came home.

now i had looked out the window again and this time it was gone and there was no sound no vibration it was just gone.I would expect noises from something so large but,there was nothing.

the object was about as thick or thicker than a full grown pine tree.

when my mom arrived i showed her the lights and she insisted that they were plains but,they weren't.One they never moved the lights circled the house.They sat there blinking and sitting.Again there was no sound and there was no movement.I no it was a star either since it was red and blinked and slowly moved closer to the house.

i continued to show my mom but she thinks i's a plain and it's not.It was so fustrating because it didn't move and it was so close to the house.There's no way it's a plain.

i keep going outside right now and all i have to do is yell blink and the lights blink uncontrolably.It's crazy.Now the craft was in the yard yesterday but i went out there again when my mom arrived and i said blink and all of a sudden there was a red burst and what looked like a "shooting star" bursted out the sky.My mom again trying to play the scientist was like "it's just a shooting star." i know it's not though because right when i said blink it came from right over the house right in front of us and just bursted out.

it's so fustrating when she thinks it's these other things when clearly it's not.My sister even saw it and was trying to tell her.Anyways.

that's pretty much what happened.If i go outside and request for the lights it'll go off again.It's so strange.

there's other odd things that's been happening as well but this was the most profound.
content.summary: There was a large white cigar shaped craft that was hovering in my yard around 9pm

content.detailedDescription:
It was 3.51am i was decorating my living room.
 
i have a different sleep pattern to most. i sleep during the day & i am awake through the night so this is normal for me to be awake at this time.
for a couple of months i had become aware of helicopter activity, usually between 2 - 5 am. i didn't think anything of this,i pressumed that it was a police helicopter following car thiefs etc... my home is near to a rough estate. 

on a couple of occasions i tryed to watch the helecopter, i did'nt seem to be able to see any outline only the lights were visable & as soon as i
tryed to take a picture it would always head away from my house every time.

i was very loud & somtimes sounded broken, it would be hovering near to my house for a couple of hours sometimes, then as soon as i grabbed my phone to go out side it would leave & often return as soon as i came inside or left my phone inside.
on one occasion the helicopter went silent i did video this with my camera phone this was also on its retreat, my partner told me that helicopters are capible of doing this.

at times i would notice that the helicopter was getting closer & closer to my house, to the point that i would run & lock my back door in case there was a criminal heading towords my garden.

on this particular evening i turned all my downstairs lights out & went in to my living room window & opened the left window & amimed my camera phone
at the helicopter/lights, i had it in my view & then zoomed in.
what i saw on my phone was a shock, i became so afraid almost to scared to take the photo. i saw a dark disk & i think there was some sort of windows at the front near the middle the top was wavey with red & green lights in the dips in the form of red, green, red, green pattern.
i tried to take the photo, my whole body was shaking, my hand trembled so much, well you can see from the photo.

i've often wondered why photo's that people take of ufo are never clear,
now i knew why.

as i took the photo there was a large obvious flash which i wasn't expecting. i panicked & felt that i had been seen.
 i ran to my hall turned the hall & toilet lights off so my house blended with the other houses with no lights on in my street.
i turned my phone off & removed the battery.
i got into bed with my partner whom was asleep.  the object 
circle a couple of times then left.

i was scared but i must have falled asleep quite quickly which suprised me.

the next day i looked at the photo & showed my partner, he does not believe
in ufos & did not want to discuss this with me.
however the memory faded & with time & i convinced my-self that i did not see what i thought i saw that night.
 
i tryed to think of other possible explanations & put the photo down to the fact that i may have caught the street lights.
i recently looked at this photo again & having learn't how to lighten pictures on doing so i realised that this was an object in the air &
not street lights.

several month's later (september) i accidently photographed other possible ufos whilst i was taking photo's of hot air ballons & sunsets.

this year my whole family had a sighting of two dark grey discs that flew right over our heads.
we all drew drawings of what we saw. i was not scared this time & enjoyed 
watching them for several minutes.

kind regards claire
content.summary: Disc with 12  maybe more  green & red lights on top

content.detailedDescription: I was upstairs in my room playing guitar when i had glanced at the moon because i noticed it was full. when all of the sudden  right in front of the moon a very bright light lit up, arc welder type bright  and i guess compared to the moon it was a little bigger or similar size to the ink jacket in a bic pen so this thing just blinks on stays where it is for a few seconds and drifts off. i ran down stairs to see if i could maybe here anything but i could not. how ever i go back up to my room and had been watching out when two of these things blinked on again this time just under the moon dirfted over to the east again once again i went down stairs to see if i could here/see more but nothing. i could not make out any sort of shape to these objects just very bright balls of light.
content.summary: Extremely bright  object  lights up hoovers then drifts off to the east.

content.detailedDescription:
Narrative below was submitted by mufon dispatch for witness based on phone conversation with witness.

as i was driving over a bridge i saw directly ahead of me an extremely bright, bluish-white light low in the sky, which seemed to be
standing still. as i crested the top of the bridge and began driving
down the other side, the light appeared to blink out.
content.summary: Bluish-white light just above treetop level

content.detailedDescription: While driving south on interstate 85 just south of atlanta, my brother-in-law, my son (18 y/o) and myself spotted a very bright blue-green light in the night sky (it was around midnight). although we were not able to make out any kind of shape it was quite obviously not an airplane (no lights other than a single bright illumination), and it was traveling at a very high rate of speed. there were in fact a few airplanes in the sky at the time, and this object was going much faster and was alot brighter than anything else around. i have lived close to the world's busiest airport for much of my life and am familar with most of the aircraft that populate the sky over and around atlanta. this was unlike anything i have ever seen. there must be others that saw the same thing. i would love to compare notes and hear from anyone that may have seen it. i wish i could provide more detail but i can only report what i (or we) saw and i know there could be a rational explanation for what we saw but i have seen many different types of aircraft and i have flown more than most and i can honestly say this was something other than what one would normally see streaking through the sky, even in atlanta at night.
content.summary: Bright blue-green light moving at high speed east-west direction

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my friend were walking down the road when i saw a saturn-like object at first i though it might be a blimp, it was rising form the horizon we watched it rise to atleast 1000 feet, suddenly it stopped and moved in our direction it maintained alitude it seemed to move as guided by intelligent force we then watched trying to figure out what it was we decided to try take a picture and go home, i grabbed my camera to get a picture and my friend took one with his phone, it did not appear in any of the pictures, i felt a feeling of excitement and intrigue as it passed by, i had a gut feeling this was not anything human. 
 note: the craft was not by the airport
content.summary: Slightly saturn like, dark, unearthly texture and material

content.detailedDescription:
In 2007 i had encounter with many non-earthly life for a longer period of time. one night before they came, i captures some pictures of warning signs, this is one of them. for more details: http://ufo-spacelife.Blogspot.Com/2009/11/unusual-encounter-2.Html 

please add this attached picture to case 18817 file (long term visitation).
content.summary: Light beam making a sharp bend & cylinder ufo object

content.detailedDescription: I was riding in the passenger seat driving down i35 going south in the middle of george town and when i looked over to my right i saw a big circular object sitting just above the wooded area that was glowing red blue yellow green and white and the colors look like they spinning and pulsating at the same time. the object was just sitting there not moving. we was driving at about 70-75 mph. it almost look like there was 2 parts to it, like the lights on the outside that was flashing and pulsating was on something that was spinning and the middle part was not moving i asked my girlfriend to look but she was too late we was already at the windy part of the highway and she was driving. it was weird i been thinking about it ever since i didn't tell my girlfriend much about it because she would call me a nut and try to tell me i must of saw something else. i don't know what it was but i know it wasn't something common it gave me chills. it looked like the top to a cooking pan. if i find a picture of something that looks like it i will post it at a later date.
content.summary: Just over the wooded area going south on i35 in georgetown tx

content.detailedDescription: I was outside raking the yard when i saw an object approaching from a distance that moved slowly. i thought that it was some sort of balloon.As it got closer it was visibly rotating in a circle with a wobble movement. as it wobbled to a certain degree it reflected light making it more visible.There was something rotating slowly around it in a circle. it increased altitude slightly and hovered for awhile then moved slightly from over the krogers grocery store to over the rite aid store on davison rd which was even closer to me. it remained there for approximately 30 minutes and it was then that i could hear the sounds that it made which sounded like a strong rush of water.There were some sort of energy around it that pulsated that was very visible.I wanted to tell others in the vacinity to simply look up and see what was so close over their heads but i did not do so because i didnt want people to think that i was weird.I called a couple people and even tried to use my phone to capture a picture but when i looked through the finder i guess the object was too far away to be seen through the cellphone.My feeling was one of aww and i felt like this was something that i would never be able to explain or see again in my lifetime..It was no airplane or helicopter or any flying object known to man. i wanted to contact bishop international airport but after doing some research i read that they refer all of those type of things to the faa and it seemed like abit much to get into. so i did nothing..But im sure this object showed up on some radar.
content.summary: Dull metallic object that wobbled around in a circle off its axis with something rotating around it.

content.detailedDescription: My wife's friend in brazil often drives along a highway near palamas, to that is known for sightings of orbs. he is a well-respected business owner and city council president, family man and very down to earth. he saw the orb approach his car and match his speed and direction ahead of the car approximately a quarter of a kilometer ahead. he took two photos with his cell phone. the cell phone does not have a flash. i tried duplicating the pictures with a digital camera and my cell phone, and this is definately not the result of a flash going off in the car. the dirt on the windshield would be predominately lit. the best duplication i got was with my cell camera, in twilight, of a bright street light. there seems to be a reflection on the road of the light. one could argue that the orb is a reflection of the light on the road, but i tried to duplicate that theory with oncoming headlights and it never looked anything like the photos. the orb appears too bright in the actual photos. you can see the windshield (dirty) and the orb does not seem to be a reflection on the windshield. the gentleman's wife also reported seeing a green orb flying very close to her car along the same road about a year before. this stretch of road and the surrounding area is well known for sightings of this type.
content.summary: Bright orb follows car, then streaks away. 2 cell phone pictures taken

content.detailedDescription: I was working overnight security and had observed a white ball of light about half the size of a full moon.It was in the tree line bordering a swap next to the front parking lot.I then began watching it the other guy who was working thought it was nothing but i realized right away that it was moving in all directions even going in to the trees which would require it to change size as well.After a few weeks i had finally convinced him that it did move and that it was not normal so we then decided to investigate.We grabed a large spotlight and flashed the object from the closest point of the parking lot.The other guy yelled something at it this is when it came right to us in the blink of an eye.And hovered 6 feat in front of us about two stories in the sky neither of us moved or spoke untill it flew up in a diagnal line went a way and at high speed but didnt just fly away it was like they vanished anyway thats it .I never told any one but friends and family untill know and thought it might be helpfull as ive found no accounts any where of some one getting these things which im not sure are aliens or ufo's to come and get up close and personal.
content.summary: I saw a ball of light of weeks in trees then me and a friend spotlihted it and it came to us.

content.detailedDescription: i arrived home around 9:50pm on november 1st, i was opening the refrigerator when i heard what i though was a plane. at first i thought nothing of it since our house isin the flight path of a nearby small airport. the sound got so loud it seemed as if a plane was going to crash into my house or a rocket was blsating off, which cuased me to look out my back door. when i looked outside there was a large disc shaped object which lit up as i stared in horror. i stared at the object in shock for about 10 seconds, and the ran to my parents room, shreaking about what i saw. it was so surreal, like something from a movie.  the craft appeared to be a dark metallic object, not silver more like black.  it was shaped like 2 plates put together with the top half scalloped like a coffee filter.  there was a ring of rotating lights around the center of the craft, 2 colors that stood out were yellow and blue.
content.summary: I heard a loud noise - looked outside and saw theufo hovering

content.detailedDescription:
on november the first at 13:50 pm i was driving north on hwy 99e going to work when two objects passed over my left shoulder headed north going very fast. 99e runs along side interstate 5 and is a path that many airlines take on the way to portland international airport so planes in the sky are common.  there is also a national guard fighter wing stationed at the airport and as a fan of the military i always watch the skies in hopes of seeing fighter planes.  these objects were long; cigar shaped and appeared to be shinny as if they were chrome plated.  they looked to be moving faster than fighter jets but appeared to be small like they had a lot of altitude.  at first i thought they were fighter planes until they made a sharp right (easterly) downward turn then they appeared to be tumbling end over end and twisting out of control towards the ground.  simultaneously as they neared the ground a third object flew directly over my truck and caught up with them.  as the third object arrived they all stopped in an elongated triangle formation then appeared to move north again.  just as they began to move they disappeared from sight.

  because of the size of the objects it looked as though they were very far away but when they began the tumble and connected with the third object it was clear they were much closer than i thought.  perhaps only 200 feet or so off the ground at their lowest point and, less than a mile in front of me.
content.summary: Two cigar shaped objects flying at high rate of speed changing directions wildly then were joined by a third object and disapeared.

content.detailedDescription:
As my mom, my sister jesenia and i were walking back home from taking the kids (my nephews) trickertreating, i decided to look at the sky as the moon was nearly full and it was a beautiful clear night. i noticed there were three glowing disc-shapped objects in the sky that zig-zagged left and right in a forward motion.  a distance behind the 3 was another one that trailed behind about the distance of the 3 that followed each other.

we were in awe to have seen what we initially thought were balloons, but we started questioning why we heard the humming and why they moved in maticulous fashion.  so we discounted them being balloons.  i tried captioring video with my hd camera, but it was too dark and they were atleast 3 miles high in the sky.
content.summary: Organge glowing and washing machine humming, zig-zagging slowly forward

content.detailedDescription:
Tonight, my family and i took a long drive in the country to take photos of the autumn leaves. as we were returning home, my daughter said "what's that up in the sky?"  we all turned to look, and i first noticed the moon, which looked pretty bright, and i saw a jet flying underneath it (going in opposite direction). at first i thought this is what she was talking about. my mother was also in the car and spotted what my daughter was seeing. it was then, that i looked to the right of the moon and saw the exact same thing i did nearly a month ago. i pulled off on a side road so my son could see it, he got out of the car, but it dissappeard from his line of view, by then it was already gone. i regretfully was not able to get any photos. 
 
this had the same long cylinder-like appearance as what i saw before. it was about 4:45 or so, and the sun had already started to set. the object was very bright white looking. we didn't notice wings or any flashing lights, just as in the incident before. this time it was heading south and did not seem to be moving nearly as fast, but still fast enough to not be able to get a good view before going over the tree tops. this object was nearly in the same area as where it was spotted before. no chem-trails, and we couldn't tell if it was making sound as we were in the car, and closer to the interstate.

we pulled back onto the main road, and tried to catch up and see if we could spot it again, but it was already gone. 

i sure would like to know if others have seen this as well. thank you.
content.summary: Second time spotting long white cylinder object.

content.detailedDescription:
It started back in may 2009; i went to my sons school to pick him up from a band concert he was in and when i left my house, i saw 3 huge lights at the corner of my dead end street. as i approached the stop sign, i found myself underneath a huge triangle; it was about 100 feet above my head and had 3 lights in the rear, 3 lights in the center and as i drove under it further, it had 3 lights in the front. it was at least an 1/8 of a mile long and 100 feet across. as i passed the nearest intersection (route 93), i finally was past it. i think i was in shock as i continued to drive to my son's school; i picked him up and as i drove back to my house, i hoped it would still be there, however it was gone. when i got home i told my mom; i must have been convincing, because she beleived me. after that, every clear night i saw a star shaped object, sometimes 3. however i new in my heart these were no stars. this continued evey clear night i could see well into the sky; these things were preety stationary and moved from south to north over the course of the night. then i started seeing objects flying away from the stationary objects with blinking lights, almost like planes except they flew erractly and eventually flew below the tree lines. two nights ago i decided to look at them through my son's binoculars and confirmed what i knew in my heart, they're not stars, they're triangular shaped and blue at the top white in the middle and towards the bottom and red at the tail. the objects that leave them are blimp shaped and the entire object blinks lights in a spike pattern, the spikes being white and red. i'm actually looking at them while i'm typing this letter! i'm disabled, therefore poor and can not afford to buy a telescope and have no means of taking pictures. i assure you that this is no hoax and i'm asking you to bring your eqiptment on any clear night and you will crap your pants!!! what freaks me out is that niagara falls has a huge airbase and can't beleive no one is reporting this! it's also over the general vacinity of southern ontario, canada, these people must be seeing what i'm seeing; why isn't anyone saying anything????????
i'm 51 years old and as sane as they come! i have a 150 iq and i'm as honest as abe lincoln! this goes on every clear night and the event lasts all night, therefore the bags under my eyes!! this is as good as it gets; please don't pass on these events, they're better than anything i've ever seen on ufo tv shows.

thanks,

[cms/tg/pid]
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: This has been going on every clear night for the past 6 months

content.detailedDescription: I was delivering pizzas and i noticed two lights that were at an angle from each other they were pulsing red and going around eachother in circles i called mufon immediatly and was on the phone with a dispatcher in florida as i was witnessing the ufos. i continued to observe for two minutes and eventually one of the craft flew away from the formation to the left and the other one stayed a bit longer and then went off to the right. my friend also saw the event from a different place. i was very excited during the event and was pulled over into a neighborhood where i flagged down a car with a family who also saw it briefly.
content.summary: Two redish orange orbs

content.detailedDescription: Opening the back door to go out and set up for the evening's festivities, i immediately noticed three bright orange lights floating towards my direction underneath the low and slow moving overcast clouds. standing there for a few seconds, i could discern they were actually moving in a direction along a major city street, morganford, just on the other side of it from me, where there is a blocks sized historic city cemetery. the lights seemed to be bobbing in the gentle but steady wind that was also moving along that direction. i noted to my friend who was standing with her back to that in the yard, that i wondered if they were chinese lanterns, many being reported in england during late spring and early summer there. neither of us have ever seen them, only pictures, but each orange light looked like a tongue of fire. we both agreed that each seemed to not have a distinct outline, but was in the shape of a "campfire" including intensity of color and brightness of the "flame," but the "fire" didn't flickr. it was more like it was light being emitted from the base of the "fire" making the "flame." they moved along, if a car, at 5 to 10 miles per hour, and appeared to be directly over the cemetery as they went by. they slowly ascended from about 15 degrees initially to about 45 degrees when they passed right by the house. when they were approaching close to the house, each of them "vibrated" at a different time within a few seconds of each other, not at the same place in the sky, nor in sequence. the middle, the first then last fire oscillated perpendicular to the direction it was going, several times in succession per each oscillation, at least three times its length in each oscillated direction. i've never heard of a crosswind making chinese lanterns oscillate that way, nor not an external structure around the internal flame. also, just as they passed the house, the clouds right by them light up with lighting bolts visible within them but made no sound! it was the only lightening we saw all night. they then seemed to start to ascend at a much faster rate and were either dimming out or getting closer to the clouds, at which point we stopped looking at them.
content.summary: Three "tongues of fire" float over neighborhood cemetery.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking out the trash and a bright object in the western sky got my attention. appeared to be diamond shaped. alternating red and white (brilliant). stayed low on the horizon, somewhat stationary for 5 min and then got dim and moved off further west toward oklahoma. when i went in to get my wife, it had already started to move off. the neighbors dog was barking during this time.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Seen on the western horizon

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were driving east bound on duhon rd (rt 724), to johnston st (hwy 167) around 8pm.  i noticed an arc of lights  (approximately 8-12 in number) flying low in the sky at my 1 o'clock position.  the lights at first reminded me of a flock of herons flying in a loose formation--relatively low and slow.     once i realized that 1) it was completely dark and 2) that the lights shifted or upon closer inspection were in a arc/boomerang pattern, and 3) equally distributed along the front of an apparent boomerang, black shape; i thought to myself -- a ufo???!  i pointed and said to my wife, "what the heck...What is that?", just as the object dimmed off it's lights--almost like going into a cloud at my 2 o'clock position.  my wife did not see the lights, but saw the boomerang object, eerily contrasted against the clear, black sky.  the object kept a constant speed and elevation throughout the sighting, but we lost track of the object once the lights were completely off and as we approached the intersection with street lights and traffic lights.  i was a little freaked out at first, but was freaked out more when my wife saw it and couldn't explain it either.  we were somewhat exhilarated by the experience too.  total time from seeing the lights to vanishing of the object was probably about 10 seconds.  later after looking at a map, the object was probably between 167 and the vermilion river.  it could have been a southwest bound plane from the lft, but it looked too big and no other common blinking airplane lights were witness before, during or after the sighting.
content.summary: Arc shape of lights on dark/black boomerang object flying low and slow.
